name: SpaceFight (Asti)
description:
SpaceFight is a survival space shooter with small changes. Gameplay is simply - you must survive as long as possible, destroying many enemies! In SpaceFight your reflex is very important. SpaceFight has 3 game mode, 4 player ships, 4 enemy ships and gravitational fields. The game is 100% free!

Features:

  • 3 game mode
  • 4 players ships
  • 4 enemy ships
  • gravitational fields
